faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about EmotionEat

question1.q: Is my data private and secure?
question1.a: Absolutely. Your data is encrypted and protected with industry-standard security (HTTPS + database-level encryption). Your journal entries are private and never shared with anyone. We don't sell your data, ever.

question2.a: Our AI uses advanced natural language processing to understand your daily entries and identify patterns in your emotional eating. It looks for triggers, contexts, and recurring behaviors to provide personalized insights.

question3.a: Yes! Both free and premium plans have no commitment. You can cancel your premium subscription at any time, and you'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

question4.q: Do I need any experience with journaling?
question4.a: Not at all! Our AI-powered chat makes journaling feel like having a conversation. Just talk about your day naturally, and the AI will guide you with helpful questions.

question5.q: What's the difference between free and premium?
question5.a: Free gives you 1 journal entry and 1 pattern analysis per week—perfect for getting started. Premium unlocks 5 daily entries with AI insights on every entry, plus 1 pattern analysis per day for deeper insights and faster progress.

question6.q: Is this a replacement for therapy?
question6.a: No. EmotionEat is a tool to help you understand patterns and build healthier habits, but it's not a substitute for professional medical or mental health care. For serious eating disorders, please consult a healthcare provider.
